snippet.title: Byakuya Monogatari ~Winchester-ke no Matsuei~ (白夜物語 ～ウィンチェスター家の末裔～)  for the NEC PC-88
snippet.description:
Came also out for:

PC-98


Game description:

The ollege student Hiroyuki Sato, which you play as, came to a hot spring resort and was shocked by a western type mansion known as The Witch's House and decided to sneak in.

Byakuya Monogatari ~Winchester-ke no Matsuei~ is a horror adventure, that also features comedy elements.
It also has a battle system where the life bar of the enemy has to go down before the player's one.
